reviews.review: Toxic community. Nothing more frustrating than guns firing at 45 degree angle from the freaking barrel. Press the trigger and play the kill lottery. Uninstalled

最经典的射击游戏，但是官匹外挂太多了。基本每把都有，而且一眼就能看出的。碰到过很多厉害的，就算枪枪抓头也不觉得是外挂。反而开挂演戏的不在少数，演技拙劣的也有。在中国火不起来的原因主要就是在于外挂太多了，游戏环境恶劣。想要游戏体验的建议5e或者face it吧，虽然也有挂，但是比官匹强太多了。
Danger!!!! очень занимательная игра, возможно потеря в пространстве и времени! Я считаю что в кс го должен каждый хоть раз но попробывать поиграть. P.S мир вам и вашим тимейтам
Great game to play and just have fun
Very international environment, good for friends, stepdads and also if your pet doesnt get aggresive from the sight of a glock it can also enjoy!
Great game, but alot of toxicity.

Despite its meh graphics and hackers and toxic 9 year-olds, CS: GO is a very good game to play. It's just fun to brag about your very good-looking skin and kill someone with a nova (bc we know why). Also, vac is smelly...

Edit: IDK why the f*ck valve made it free but it means more sqeaker noobs can play. Can those of us who purchased it get a reward or something???? PLEASE!!!!!!
Jogo do devia ser mais otimizado para PCs mais fracos alguns deve entender o meu lado
This game is fun and really entertaining to play. However it can be annoying and a pain when dealing with bad connection toxic players of campers. Overall worth it.

Disgusting game ruined by Valve's idiotic and unbelievably stupid decisions and changes.
Valve Anti Cheat is useless, the game still doesn't seem finished even after 7 years since it was released, hitboxes and the ranking system are both broken.
Not to forget, extremely toxic and immature community which will guarantee you bad matchmaking experience.
The game should implement a server picker so we can avoid certain countries whose players are known for bad behaviour.
